metadata.description: Project-specific tools for Ableton Live Set development and diffing

plugins.name: xml-element-extractor
plugins.description: Extract XML elements from Ableton Live Set files using Python

plugins.name: ableton-test-generator
plugins.description: Generate test cases for Ableton Live Set devices and components

plugins.name: security-data-leak-scanner
plugins.description: Scan codebases for potential personal data leaks and sensitive information

plugins.name: zen-code-reviewer
plugins.description: Comprehensive code review agent with thorough analysis and quality assurance

plugins.name: ocaml-lsp
plugins.description: LSP integration for OCaml via ocamllsp

plugins.name: ocaml-code-indent
plugins.description: Automatically format OCaml files with ocp-indent after edits

plugins.name: ableton-save
plugins.description: Save Ableton Live projects via natural language or slash command using AppleScript automation

plugins.name: architect-analyst
plugins.description: Deep architectural analysis and solution design agent for complex problems
